thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com | 3 of 186
thread.title: nicola
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by nicola

author: nicola
title: nicola
text: I ordered the baked extravaganza, which came with a cake, brownies and cookies. Everything was excellent and arrived in perfect shape; even the cheesecake i ordered. The original cake i ordered was unavailable but BakeMeAWish contacted me immediately. We exchanged several emails and my second choice arrived perfectly on time and in perfect condition.
